title: Includes vehicle as an instrumentality of the crime of driving while intoxicated
summary: Specifically includes a motor vehicle as an "instrumentality" of the crime when the charge is one of driving while intoxicated and also requires the district attorney to seek civil forfeiture of a vehicle upon a third charge of DWI within a 5 year period.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to civil forfeiture of a motor vehicle in connection with a DWI charge
